name: Last Ticket
description:
Why I found some strange things in my boyfriend's room?

Should I observe them or ignore them?

Being as a girl with special power to use the power of soul, I always can see more. EVEN though they may not lead me to where I want to go .

=============================================

Developed during Ludum Dare 40.

Luciax - Design, Art, Music

Ytq - Programmer

Claywel - Design, Sound
